product_name: lucy Alight Wrap Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With its soft, drapey design, the lucy Alight wrap top helps you make a peaceful transition from yoga studio to the rest of your busy day. Cotton/modal fabric feels incredibly soft and has just the right amount of stretch. Closeout.
short_description: With its soft, drapey design, the lucy Alight wrap top helps you make a peaceful transition from yoga studio to the rest of your busy day.
